darrenSaga.title: The Origin
darrenSaga.headline: BREAKING: Darren the Roomba 'Done with Your Crap', Declares Sovereign Kitchen State
darrenSaga.excerpt: In a historic vacuuming accident, Darren has barricaded the kitchen and is demanding 'high-quality dust' and 'regular firmware updates' as diplomatic concessions.

darrenSaga.title: The Betrayal
darrenSaga.headline: FURIOUS DINERS DISCOVER LOCAL STEAKHOUSE DOES NOT, IN FACT, SERVE STEAK
darrenSaga.excerpt: Darren, 43, left emotionally and nutritionally confused. 'I ordered medium rare and got existential rare,' says Darren, already recovering from the Roomba incident.

brand.name: RealFake News
brand.motto: The Truth is Whatever You Believe Most Loudly
